## Research Interests

-   Biogeography, spatial ecology, conservation biology, and GIS

-   Anthropogenic shifts in habitat suitability and organism/assemblage distribution

-   Forest, freshwater, and coastal ecosystems; ecological restoration

-   Ecology and conservation of amphibians, aquatic invertebrates, and rare plants

-   Field-based, experiential, and community-engaged learning in ecology
